content.raw:
I was planning on tackling the componentization of the mesh in this PR, but I think we can wait to see how sensors will construct the rendering scene and handle it then. Maybe we can get away with just passing the URI around. It will also depend on where fuel will be integrated.

So I think we can merge this in its current state, untested and with a mesh loading POC, just so the PRs don't start to pile up.
